name: Butter Chicken
description: A popular dish of marinated and grilled chicken pieces cooked in a creamy tomato-based sauce

name: Mutton Curry
description: A spicy and flavorful dish of tender mutton pieces cooked in a onion and coconut gravy with aromatic spices

name: Fish Curry
description: A mild and delicious dish of fish fillets simmered in a coconut milk and curry leaf sauce

name: Chicken Kadhai
description: A popular Indian dish of savoury chicken served in an onion tomato gravy

name: Prawn Curry
description: A succulent and tasty dish of prawns cooked in a tomato and onion gravy with coconut milk and spices

name: Palak Paneer
description: A popular dish of soft paneer cubes cooked in a smooth and creamy spinach gravy with spices

name: Dal Tadka
description: A simple and comforting dish of yellow lentils tempered with cumin seeds, garlic, red chilies and curry leaves

name: Aloo Gobi
description: A dry and flavorful dish of potatoes and cauliflower florets roasted with turmeric, coriander, garam masala and other spices

name: Veg Pulao
description: A fragrant and delicious rice dish cooked with vegetables, nuts, raisins and aromatic spices in a sealed pot

name: Kadhi Pakora
description: A tangy and creamy dish of yogurt-based gravy with besan fritters, seasoned with fenugreek seeds, asafoetida and red chili powder
